titleStmt.title: A heauenly harmonie of spirituall songes, and holy himnes, of godly men, patriarkes, and prophets
Harmonie of the church
titleStmt.author: Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Thomas Orwin, reissued probably by W. White],

notesStmt.note: "To the curteous reader" signed: M.D., i.e. Michael Drayton.
A reissue, probably by W. White, of "A harmonie of the church", printed by Thomas Orwin, 1591, with new title page cancelling A1 and 2 (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
